Description: Saudi Ceramic Co (known as: Saudi Ceramics) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Saudi Ceramics operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Building Products. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Trading Companies and Distributors, Industrial Machinery, Commodity Chemicals and Gas Utilities. Saudi Ceramics is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in April 1977.

Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia
